caseTitle: Commissioner Inland Revenue, RTO, Rawalpindi v. M/s Trillium Pakistan (Pvt) Ltd, Rawalpindi & others
tagline: An explanation in a statute (in this case a fiscal statute) ordinarily operates to clarify the law prospectively. However, retrospective liability is imposed when an explanation attributes a meaning to a substantive provision or expression whereby the burden, obligation or liability of a person is increased for a past period. Such retrospective impact is to be avoided unless the express language of the explanation warrants such an interpretation.
